Package io.hekate.failover

Failover API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FailoverCondition
    Condition for FailoverPolicyBuilder.
    FailoverContext
    Failover context.
    FailoverDelaySupplier
    Supplier of retry delay for FailoverPolicyBuilder.
    FailoverPolicy
    « start hereFailover policy.
    FailureInfo
    Provides information about an operation failure to FailoverPolicy.
    FailureResolution
    Failure resolution.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstantFailoverDelay
    Implementation of FailoverDelaySupplier that always returns the same value.
    FailoverPolicyBuilder
    Builder for FailoverPolicy.
    MaxFailoverAttempts
    Implementation of FailoverCondition that performs failover actions with a limited number of attempts.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FailoverRoutingPolicy
    Specifies how routing should behave in case of a failover action.

Package io.hekate.failover Description

Failover API.
